note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices. This shortfall does not take into account costs and inefficiencies from making the necessary transfers. Income has been [equivalized](#dod:equivalization).
title: Total shortfall from a poverty line of $40 a day (before tax)
subtitle: This is the amount of money that would be theoretically needed to lift the incomes of all people in poverty up to $40 per day. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries. Income here is measured before taxes and benefits.
